sheet.text: Alright, we're here!
This is the Constellation Zone.
So... what now?
Let me check your bear-friend's note...
It says, "Hold an explosive battle..." What does that last part say?
Ah! "...an explosive battle with the Tetris King!"
Well then.
How the heck is THAT supposed to fix your ship?
*thinking sounds* So who the heck is the Tetris King...?
And where the heck can we find him?
Right the heck here!
WHAT...!?
YOU'RE the Tetris King!?
Whew...!
So you're the Tetris King, Tee?
The one and only!
But that doesn't make any sense.
I mean, it's such a bland title. You couldn't get a better one?
Hey! I worked hard for my title!
Besides, it's a more recent development.
You see there was a former Tetris King, but he sorta vanished into thin air.
Poof!
"Poof"...?
Poof.
Right... so, uh... maybe we should head back down and re-fuel...?
Hrrgh! You're right! That could've been disastrous! Let's go!
Guess it's our turn to help fix the ship.
This "Consolation" Zone is beautiful...!
It's "Constella--" Eh, whatever. So what do WE need to do?
Give me that note. I wanna read it.
It says: "Two fashionable ladies battling in lady-like fashion."
"Lady-like," huh?
"Lady-like"...
OH!
*ahem* Lady Amitie, will you do me the honour of an hostile encounter?
Lady Ess, it sounds like 'tis the social event of the season. I shall RSVP at once!
Hahaha! You ARE dreadfully good at this, I do declare.
Oh, you flatter me, Mademoiselle~!
*lady-like chuckle*
Okay, I'm over this!
Eh, me too.
It WAS fun though, don't you think? Next time, let's roll our R's!
Pipe down. I'm heading back to the ship!
Ess...? Wait!
Don't leave me out here!
Looks like it's our turn to go up into space.
It says, "A clash between the two most adorable sidekicks."
Pi~Pi~Pipi~Pipi~!
Gu~Gu~Gugu~Gugu~!
Pipi~Pipi~! Pipi~Pipi~! Pipipipi~Pipipipi~! Pi~!
Gugu~Gugu~! Gugu~Gugu~! Gugugugu~Gugugugu~! Gu~!
It's almost musical when you two are in sync!
I can't imagine a more adorable battle than this~!
Pi~Pi~! Pi~Pi~!
Gu~Gu~! Gu~Gu~!
Gugu...
Pipi...
Well, looks like we did our part!
Carby, you okay if we head back home?
Looks like we gathered everything we need to fix the Tetra.
I'm in your debt, everyone.
Ai is working on the repairs right now.
I still don't get why Rulue was acting so weird last time...
But at least we took care of one problem!
Gu-Gugu!
*sigh*
Amitie, are you still thinking about what happened with Raffina...?
Mmhm...
She didn't seem like herself.
I'm really worried... and we don't know where she went.
Hey there, Amitie!
Eh?
I know that voice...
Lemres!
Glad I finally found ya.
...I had a hunch you'd end up here.
Uh, Ringo... who's that?
Him? That's Lemres. He's a friend of Amitie's.
And he's pretty good at popping Puyos.
Lemres~! What're you doing here?
Somethin' strange is goin' on in our world.
There's these things from the sky... They're like giant blocks.
Crazy, huh? They're just rainin' down on Primp Town.
Huh!? That sounds like Tetriminos!
But why are they on our world!?
I couldn't tell ya.
But hey, it gets weirder than that.
They say two strangers showed up outta nowhere.
A green-haired boy with horns... and a droolin' shadowy-guy.
What was that!?
Are you...
...thinking what...
...I'm thinking...?
That depends...
Do you think...
...it might be...
...the SAME TWO PEOPLE!?
Hm? What "same two people"?
Oh, just two people we know.
They're always doing nasty things. Cruel, even!
Two nasty and cruel people, eh?
You rang, Captain?
Definitely not. We were talking about two OTHER nasty and cruel people.
Hmph! Be more specific next time.
It's them. I'm sure of it.
Well, uh...
Say, why don't y'all just come back to Primp Town with me?
I mean, we could use a hand cleanin' up.
Okie-dokie-eggs-n'-yolky!
Me and Arle and Amitie will go with Lemres.
And Ris, Maguro, and the others...?
Maybe you could stay here and help fix the Tetra?
Nice to meet you, Lemres.
I'm Captain Tee, and this is my friend, O.
We'll help too, if that's alright.
What? Why are YOU going? You don't have anything to do with this!
I think those Tetriminos are related to our predicament.
Besides, these three have helped so much. It's my turn to help them!
Pipi~Pipi~!
Thanks, Tee. Ready to go?
Hold up, I said I was going to help, right?
Let me first help out by teaching you how to take care of Tetriminos.
Easy as pie...
Do they go "POP!" like Puyos?
Not quite a "pop," exactly...
VISUAL DEMONSTRATION!
Ah, gotcha... So that's how ya clear those blocks.
Got the hang of it?
Let's see if the student can beat the teacher though.
Huh...?
Now, now, don't get ahead of yourself.
*sigh* Fine, I guess we don't HAVE to do a Tetris battle...
WHAT? You think I'm going to let you withdraw a challenge...?
Hahaha! I was hopin' ya wouldn't!
Show me what you've learned!
TETRIS BATTLE!
Hey, you aren't half bad!
Hahaha! The other half o' you isn't so bad either!
Guess, since we're both half-good, I'll share my cake with you.
Huh...? Wh-What's a "cake"?
Say! This thing's kind of... moist and fluffy.
Ya never had CAKE before!?
We don't have a lot of squishy things back in my world.
Hey, take these too! I got jams n' jellies n' puddin' n' pie!
A-Are those all the same thi-- Hey, these are pretty amazing!
Um, hello? Tee? Lemres...?
If you're done with snack time, can we get going?
Oh! Right! My apologies.
It's fine.
Sorry... I'm a sucker for sweets. --Oooh! SUCKERS!
*ahem* Right! Let's go!
Follow me, everyone. I know the way!
This'll be easy. A piece o' cake! ...With cream cheese frostin'!
